content: उष्णीषः, --षं [उष्णमीषते हिनस्ति ईष्-क <ls>Tv.</ls>] {@--1@} Anything wound round the head. {@--2@} Hence, a turban, diadem, crownet; बलाकापांडुरोष्णीषं <ls>Mk. 5. 19</ls>; °पट्ट <ls>K. 106</ls>; <ls>Ratn. 1. 4.</ls> {@--3@} A distinguishing mark. {@--4@} A characteristic mark (of hair) on the head of a Buddha which indicates his future sanctity.

उष्णीषः, --षं [उष्णमीषते हिनस्ति ईष्-क <ls>Tv.</ls>] {@--1@} Anything wound round the head. {@--2@} Hence, a turban, diadem, crownet; बलाकापांडुरोष्णीषं <ls>Mk. 5. 19</ls>; °पट्ट <ls>K. 106</ls>; <ls>Ratn. 1. 4.</ls> {@--3@} A distinguishing mark. {@--4@} A characteristic mark (of hair) on the head of a Buddha which indicates his future sanctity.
